name: Aethersnipe
oracle_text:
When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Alloy Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: With or without witnesses, the suns continued their prismatic dance.

name: Apostle's Blessing
oracle_text:
({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Target artifact or creature you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Aquastrand Spider
oracle_text:
Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

name: Arrest
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.

name: Blades of Velis Vel
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain all creature types until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The changing kind suffers as we do. We must join as one to quench our tyrants!"

name: Blinding Souleater
oracle_text: {W/P}, {T}: Tap target creature. ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
flavor_text:
"We thank the souleaters for inscribing our souls with subservience, to reinforce the sacred order."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Blood Ogre
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Ogres taunt the dragons by moving into their territory, but even the hellkites find them too much trouble to hunt."
—Marza, mountain scout

name: Bloodthrone Vampire
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

name: Brute Force
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Blood, bone, and sinew are magnified, as is the rage that drives them. The brain, however, remains unchanged—a little bean, swinging by a strand in a cavernous, raving head.

name: Burst Lightning
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

name: Cathodion
oracle_text: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C}.
flavor_text: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

name: Cloud Elemental
oracle_text:
Flying
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"The sky teems with just as much life as the forest or the deep seas."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Commune with Nature
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Conclave Phalanx
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

name: Copper Carapace
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"We will fight as they do: our flesh protected behind metal."
—Tae Aquil, Viridian weaponsmith

name: Court Homunculus
oracle_text: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.
flavor_text: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

name: Darksteel Citadel
oracle_text:
Indestructible
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Structures built from darksteel yield to neither assault nor age.

name: Death Denied
oracle_text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

name: Dragonsoul Knight
oracle_text:
First strike
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Dragonsoul Knight becomes a Dragon, gets +5/+3, and gains flying and trample.
flavor_text: The farther he roamed from Jund and its dragons, the more he felt their essence in himself.

name: Dread Drone
oracle_text: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.

name: Duskhunter Bat
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Flying
flavor_text: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

name: Faerie Mechanist
oracle_text:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

name: Flayer Husk
Fortify
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Frogmite
oracle_text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
flavor_text: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

name: Ghostly Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{1}{B}: Ghostly Changeling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In desolate places, changelings may take the shape of fancies, or memories, or fears.

name: Glint Hawk Idol
oracle_text:
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Glint Hawk Idol become a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
{W}: Glint Hawk Idol becomes a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

name: Gnarlid Pack
oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

name: Goblin Fireslinger
oracle_text: {T}: Goblin Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: A rock between your eyes hurts. A burning rock between your eyes ruins your whole day.

name: Goblin War Paint
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
flavor_text: War paint made from kolya fruit heightens senses and lessens fear. Unfortunately, fear is usually what keeps you alive.

name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

name: Grim Affliction
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.

name: Gust-Skimmer
oracle_text: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Phyrexian smog clouds choked the skies, threatening creatures who couldn't comprehend the menace below.

name: Gut Shot
oracle_text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Gut Shot deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Down here, we have a more pointed version of the scriptures."
—Urabrask's enforcer

name: Helium Squirter
oracle_text:
Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

name: Inner-Flame Igniter
oracle_text: {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: A light an army can follow.

name: Instill Infection
oracle_text:
Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."
—Vedalken research notes

name: Kami of Ancient Law
oracle_text: Sacrifice Kami of Ancient Law: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Duty and law are the foundation on which civilization stands. They must not fall, for when they do, they take everything with them."
—Lord Konda

name: Kavu Primarch
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

name: Kitesail
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

name: Kozilek's Predator
oracle_text: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Matca Rioters
oracle_text: Domain — Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor_text: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Moonlit Strider
oracle_text:
Sacrifice Moonlit Strider: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Myr Enforcer
oracle_text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
flavor_text: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

name: Nameless Inversion
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Target creature gets +3/-3 and loses all creature types until end of turn.
flavor_text: Just as a changeling's influence can have dramatic effects, so too can its sudden withdrawal.

name: Narcolepsy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.
flavor_text:
"It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Nest Invader
oracle_text: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

name: Otherworldly Journey
oracle_text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends."
—Journal found in Numai

name: Plagued Rusalka
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."
—Savra

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Raise the Alarm
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

name: Repeal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator

name: Runed Servitor
oracle_text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

name: Rusted Relic
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Rusted Relic is a 5/5 Golem artifact creature as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text:
"We consider rust a curable disease."
—Tarrin, Hammer-Tribe shaman

name: Scatter the Seeds
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

name: Scion of the Wild
oracle_text: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text: It has a hundred thousand extinctions to avenge.

name: Scuttling Death
oracle_text:
Sacrifice Scuttling Death: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Shrivel
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us."
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

name: Sickle Ripper
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: His sickle was forged in the heat of another cinder's funeral pyre.

name: Sickleslicer
Sign in Blood
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

name: Simic Initiate
oracle_text: Graft 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
flavor_text: Simic initiates begin their training as experimental subjects. Failures are flushed to the undersewers.

name: Skyhunter Skirmisher
oracle_text: Flying, double strike
flavor_text:
"Like dawn's first light, blind the unprepared and banish the shadows."
—Skyhunter creed

name: Skyreach Manta
oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Flying
flavor_text: As the dawns break, the manta soars.

name: Smash to Smithereens
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
flavor_text: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

name: Smokebraider
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.
flavor_text: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

name: Somber Hoverguard
oracle_text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
flavor_text: The vedalken interrogate all intruders—once the hoverguards are done with them.

name: Soulbright Flamekin
oracle_text: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

name: Sphere of the Suns
oracle_text:
Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color.

name: Steady Progress
oracle_text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "More of that strange oil . . . It's probably nothing."

name: Stoic Rebuttal
oracle_text:
Metalcraft — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.

name: Sundering Vitae
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Centuries of wind, rain, and roots compressed into an instant of destruction: such is the power of Selesnya.

name: Sunlance
oracle_text: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.
flavor_text:
"It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power."
—Orim, Samite inquisitor

name: Sunspear Shikari
oracle_text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.
flavor_text: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

name: Sylvan Bounty
oracle_text:
Target player gains 8 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

name: Telling Time
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

name: Terashi's Grasp
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its mana value.
flavor_text:
"The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within."
—Noboru, master kitemaker

name: Thief of Hope
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Soulshift 2 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Thoughtcast
oracle_text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

name: Thrive
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.
flavor_text: The most successful of Simic creations is cytoplasm, a living, symbiotic substance that feeds off genetic rhythms and strengthens its host in return.

name: Thrummingbird
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Tribal Flames
oracle_text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor_text:
"Fire is the universal language."
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Tukatongue Thallid
oracle_text: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

name: Ulamog's Crusher
oracle_text:
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us."
—Nirthu, lone missionary

name: Vampire Lacerator
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.
flavor_text: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

name: Vapor Snag
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Viashino Slaughtermaster
oracle_text:
Double strike
{B}{G}: Viashino Slaughtermaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: "I'll fight two at once, and then lick their guts from my blades."

name: Vigean Graftmage
oracle_text:
Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}{U}: Untap target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Vines of Vastwood
oracle_text:
Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Waking Nightmare
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"Once each year, the oni and other evil spirits paraded through villages to disturb mortals' sleep. During the war, this parade became a nightly event."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Waxmane Baku
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Waxmane Baku.
{1}, Remove X ki counters from Waxmane Baku: Tap X target creatures.

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

name: Wings of Velis Vel
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 4/4, gains all creature types, and gains flying.
flavor_text: Changeling magic grants unusual wishes.

name: Wrap in Flames
oracle_text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."
—*The War Diaries*
